doc:
David Eigenberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Eigenberg 0 David Eigenberg (born May 17, 1964) is an American actor. Eigenberg is best known for his long-running role as Steve Brady on the HBO sit-com, Sex and the City, and for his role as Lieutenant Christopher Herrmann, on NBC's Chicago Fire. David_Eigenberg ( born May_17_,_1964 ) is an_American_actor . Eigenberg is_best_known for his_long-running_role as Steve_Brady on the_HBO_sit-com , Sex and the_City , and for his_role as Lieutenant_Christopher_Herrmann , on NBC 's_Chicago_Fire .
